title: Eligible for PBE?
body: I was wondering if my account was eligible for PBE testing. Waited a lot and haven't changed my roles of playing tank champs and fighter champs.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and do see that you have applied to the pbe, but it's not something we can force or expedite.  I don't have any information to share about how applicants are chosen beyond our [pbe faq](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq), or how long that might take.  I wish you the best of luck with admissions!
